job_description:
• (or equivalent education) in Electrical Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Materials Science, Chemical Engineering, Chemistry, Physics, or other related technical fields.
• Developing etch processes to meet the physical and electrical requirements of Micron’s products.
• Proficiency in statistics, preferably in statistical process control.
• Strong analytical and creative problem-solving skills.
• Experience in experimental design and data analysis.
• Experience in programming or scripting is desirable.
• Currently pursuing a M.
• Knowledge of semiconductor processing, solid-state device physics, and of dry etch processing or plasma physics is desirable.
